information.name: Stores the user's name/codename/nickname
information.rank: Stores the rank that the user has in the community

jobs.Traducator: Knows how to sub(translate) files in different languages
jobs.Verificator: Knowledgeable in different languages and has the ability to spot mistakes in subbed files
jobs.Encoder: Has a powerful computer, a good internet connection and has good encoding skills
jobs.Stiri: Good at expressing his thoughts in words and knows how to write news articles
jobs.Postator: Knows how to post new releases on the site
